titleStmt.title: An advertisement. These are to give notice to all noblemen, gentlemen, citizens and others, that we, the students in the Royal Colledge of Edinburgh, (to shew our detestation and abhorrence of the Romish religion; and our zeal and fervency for the Protestant) ...
titleStmt.author: University of Edinburgh.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
